question: وَنُذِيقُهُ
answer: and We will make him taste

question: وَالْمَطْلُوبُ
answer: and the one who is sought

question: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ
answer: And they ask you to hasten

question: الْقَانِعَ
answer: the needy who do not ask

question: يُمِيتُكُمْ
answer: He will cause you to die

question: يُنَازِعُنَّكَ
answer: So let them not dispute with you
